body: Now this is a good Manga, i can roughly understood the gists of it just by reading anything that i can even without context in understandable words, now thats just gone to shown that these Authors who can do that is a good Writer. Good stuff.

I found a rough translation. Long story short, it's a sequel to "The girl in the miserable shack". Her brother, who was working in another country, finds his sister working in a brothel. The girl goes a little crazy, but ends up begging him for help. Naturally, he saves her
This guy's art is so good, deserve  a translated ver and lastly what happened to the girl in the end?
Page 8, I make my own wallpaper
